$('.radio-with-before').button beforeactive: -> d = $.Deferred() @html 'Loading...' @addClass '_disabled_' setTimeout -> d.resolve() ,2000 d.promise() onactive: -> @removeClass '_disabled_' @html 'Checked' beforeunactive: -> d = $.Deferred() @html 'Unchecking...' @addClass '_disabled_' setTimeout -> d.resolve() ,3000 d.promise() onunactive: -> @removeClass '_disabled_' @html 'Radio'

Properties

Name Default Description
toggle @$btn.data('toggle') or 'button' To find all buttons in the DOM and initialize them.
type @$btn.data('type') or 'button' button, radio, checkbox. Define button's behaviour.
group none String. Uses for type: radio, just type any name for group of radiobuttons.
event "click" This event will be used to activate/deactivate button.

Methods

Inside each method to get button use @ or this in js. Class instance always stores in data attribute of the button element @data('kit-button') or this.data('kit-button') in js.
Method Default Description
beforeactive undefined

Set a function to call it before activate button. If it returns deferred.promise(), then button will not activate till deferred.resolve(), and woun't activate at all if deferred.reject(). You can just get data with $.ajax() instead of using deferred.

$('.btn-with-before').button beforeactive: -> d = $.Deferred() @html 'Loading...' @addClass '_disabled_' setTimeout -> d.resolve() ,2000 d.promise() onactive: -> @removeClass '_disabled_' @html 'Checked' onunactive: -> @html 'Checkbox'

onactive undefined

Set a function to call it after button activation.
beforeactive undefined

Call this function before deactivate button.
onunactivate undefined

Call this function after deactivate button.
